template.template: Template SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DABPlus Go
template.name: Template SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DABPlus Go
template.description: SNMP template for monitoring [AVT MAGIC AE1 DAB+ Go](http://www.avt-nbg.de/index.php/en/products/dab/encoders/magic-ae1-dab-go) devices based on the `AVT-MIB` and `AVT-AE1-DABPLUS-GO-MIB`.

item.name: Alarm count reset
item.description: Date and time of the last alarm counter reset.

valuemap.name: AVT AE1 DABPlus Go clock source

discovery_rule.name: Alarms
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of Alarms
Returns the following macro for each available Alarm * `{#ALARM_NAME}` * Alarm name (`AVT-AE1-DABPLUS-GO-MIB::amae1dabpgoAlarmName`).

item_prototype.name: Block counter of alarm "$1"
item_prototype.description: Alarm block counter. Number of state changes to True during the throttle interval. This counter is cleared when the corresponding notification has been issued.

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Alarm {#ALARM_NAME}

item_prototype.name: Count of alarm "$1"
item_prototype.description: Alarm counter. Changes of the state to True.

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Alarm {#ALARM_NAME}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Alarm {#ALARM_NAME}

item_prototype.name: Timestamp of alarm "$1"
item_prototype.description: Alarm timestamp. Date and time of the last state change.

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Alarm {#ALARM_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: "{#ALARM_NAME}" alarm on {HOST.NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The `{#ALARM_NAME}` alarm's state has fired (is not `false`).

discovery_rule.name: Encoders
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of encoders
Returns the following macro for each available encoder * `{#ENCODER_STATE}` * Status information about the current operation (`AVT-AE1-DABPLUS-GO-MIB::amae1dabpgoEncoderState`). * `{#ENCODER_ONAIR}` * On-air status information (`AVT-AE1-DABPLUS-GO-MIB::amae1dabpgoEncoderOnAir`).

valuemap.name: AVT AE1 DABPlus Go encoder algorithm

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}

valuemap.name: AVT AE1 DABPlus Go audio mode

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}
SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}

item_prototype.name: State of encoder "$1"
item_prototype.description: Status information about the current operation.

valuemap.name: AVT AE1 DABPlus Go encoder state

application_prototype.name: SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DAB+ Go Encoder {#SNMPINDEX}

trigger_prototype.name: Encoder "{#SNMPINDEX}" is not in running state ({ITEM.VALUE1}) on {HOST.NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The encoder "`{#SNMPINDEX}`" is not in `running(2)` state on this device.

trigger_prototype.name: Encoder "{#SNMPINDEX}" is not on-air on {HOST.NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The encoder "`{#SNMPINDEX}`" on-air status is not in `true(1)` on this device.

dependency.name: Encoder "{#SNMPINDEX}" is not in running state ({ITEM.VALUE1}) on {HOST.NAME}

Template SNMPv2 AVT AE1 DABPlus Go
